name: Point-One Innovation Fund
overview:
The Netherlands has a high degree of innovation and plays an important role in many technology areas from electronics, semiconductors, software, communications, cars, medical, chemistry, agriculture and others.

That provides opportunities for new companies to leverage the technology expertise in The Netherlands into innovative products and services. A big idea can start in a small country because there are no boundaries to the creative and innovative power.

The Point-One Starter Fund supports start-up / early stage companies in The Netherlands to transform such ideas into successful products and services by means of venture capital financing, experience and our network.

The team and network consists of people who come from the technology sector, who have managed companies and businesses, developed products and who have created business worldwide.

funding_round.source_description: Vector Fabrics initial investment risk fund for techno
